Rect.setSize

Function/Meaning
Sets the rectangle size
Type
Method of the Rect class
Syntax
setSize(width, height)
Arguments
width Specifies the width of the rectangle.
This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.width property.
height Specifies the height of the rectangle.
This value can also be retrieved or set via the Rect.height property.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Specifies the rectangle size.
